cu.explanation_en: Setting tracking_area_code to -1 (negative value) will cause configuration errors and prevent cell setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting powerRampingStep to 10 (invalid value, valid range 0-3) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent PRACH setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 powerRampingStep 設定為 10（無效值，有效範圍 0-3）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 PRACH 設定。
